TopicTitle: [We need more posts! (Like seriously, a lot more)] Let's Make This the Megathread!

Articles.Content:
32 minutes ago, Wizard Kerbal said:

What's a dragon? I got a message saying, "What Are You?" Before I quit out of fear that something attacked me in my no-no square. Is it that?
But I understand where Reapers are and how they'll attack, so i'm not really scared of them unless they come out of the darkness and attack me. Ghost Leviathans, those beautiful blue lights that bite, terrified me. I've only seen 1, but I've never ran faster.

"Ooh pretty! What's that?"

It screeched and charged at me, making my ears ring and fear fill me, like the first time I encountered a reaper with nothing but a seaglide.

I love the seamoth and cyclops sonars, you can see way ahead with them, in my newest save I was swimming around with my seamoth until I saw the gulper leviathan, a rougly reaper-sized aggressive leviathan from a mod, he nearly destroyed my seamoth, where it not for the shocking system thing

with Dragon I mean the SPOILERS MAYBE

Spoiler

sea dragon

and I just find reapers scary looking, like even if they don't roar and move and stuff

I find ghosts cute, not the crater edge ones though
